body_html:
Had the same issue:
search for nsync_cv.h file using:
sudo find / -name nsync_cv.h
then add it in the file mutex.h
#include "tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/nsync/public/nsync_cv.h"
#include "tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/nsync/public/nsync_mu.h"

If you get linker error after above step try this: #12904 (comment)
body_text:
Had the same issue:
search for nsync_cv.h file using:
sudo find / -name nsync_cv.h
then add it in the file mutex.h
#include "tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/nsync/public/nsync_cv.h"
#include "tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/nsync/public/nsync_mu.h"
If you get linker error after above step try this: #12904 (comment)
body:
Had the same issue:
search for nsync_cv.h file using:
`sudo find / -name nsync_cv.h`
then add it in the file `mutex.h`
`#include "tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/nsync/public/nsync_cv.h"`
`#include "tensorflow/contrib/makefile/downloads/nsync/public/nsync_mu.h"`

If you get linker error after above step try this: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/12904#issuecomment-328234880
